summary: Update the assignment and audio recording flow: remove the upload button, support recording/delete in the audio recorder with confirmed sharing to team members, and restore/standardize assignment titles across UI including pop-up menus.

existing_features.title: Remove (hide/disable) all UI elements that allow users to upload an existing audio file (e.g., file picker, "Upload" button meant for selecting a local file) anywhere in the app.

Ensure the in-app audio recorder flow is active and usable: users can start recording, stop recording, review the recorded audio, and proceed with the existing save/share action without exposing a user-facing control labeled "Upload".

Add confirmation step before sharing a recorded audio to team members; after confirmation the recording becomes visible to the team.
Ensure recordings can be recorded and deleted within the audio recorder.
Rename all assignments to: Awareness, Utopia, Small steps, Support strategie, Other contemplations, and ensure these names are used correctly in all pop-up menus.
